name: import-index-generator
description: Autogenerate a JS modules which exports all the modules present on a directory
author: Cycloid (https://cycloid.io)

scripts.test-same-output-dir: node main.js fixtures fixtures/result-js > /dev/null && diff fixtures/result-js fixtures/output-js
scripts.test-diff-output-dir: node main.js fixtures result-js-and-vue js,vue > /dev/null && diff  result-js-and-vue fixtures/output-js-and-vue
scripts.test: npm run -s test-same-output-dir && npm run -s test-diff-output-dir && npm run -s clean
